item.description: ``` // It recognizes this *: as a Tuple2 (1 *: 2 *: EmptyTuple): Tuple2[_, _] // But then why not also a Product2? (1 *: 2 *: EmptyTuple): Product2[_, _] ``` https://scastie.scala-lang.org/eRT8upcTQG6IvTkZrSArnQ #Scala #Scala3
